How It Works

No coding required. Three simple steps.

1

Describe Your Project

Tell us what you're building. "A fintech dashboard with dark mode" or "A mobile fitness app". The AI understands context.

2

AI Generates Everything

Our AI consults 48 UX Laws and analyzes 37 Design Tests to create a complete design system tailored to your project.

3

Apply to Figma

One click exports colors, typography, and spacing to Figma Variables. Start designing immediately with validated decisions.
